storyInfo: Dusk uses an Ink Spirit to pass a message onto the pair, conveying her request to seek out the master of the goblet. Lee entrusts the pole-carrier with helping him find leads, but falls prey to a trap set by the innkeeper.

attributes.text: I was born in a small village a hundred li away from what is today Shangshu. It was a beautiful oasis.
If you gazed out from the village, you would see a range of mountains that formed a line. The line enveloped a swath of land named Shangshu.
There was a Catastrophe when I was young. The mountains covered a wide area, and the looming clouds covered an even wider area..

The Catastrophe Messengers were quick at their work. As we evacuated, we could see sparks lighting up the sky. All of us knew that Shangshu's Three Mounts would never look the same after the Catastrophe passed.
I was still very young. All I remember is the adults' swaying backs and their forced smiles.
The rescue team moved quickly, but all of us knew that the houses, the farms, and the orchards would all perish in the storm.
We passed a mountain on our way.
With my own eyes, I saw a drunken woman lounging in a pavilion.
I saw her share a toast with the sky.
I saw her fall unconscious in the pavilion, completely inebriated.
But the rescue team didn't stop. The adults around me pretended as though they didn't see her.

attributes.content: ...A black goblet.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Was this the cup she drank from...?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Miss Li...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Sir! Do you need something?
attributes.name: Part-Timer

attributes.content: Can you describe the guest just now?
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Of course... I could never forget a Forte hunk like him...
attributes.name: Part-Timer

attributes.content: Prepare two boxes of pastries and pay Miss Ning a visit.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: If Miss Ning meets with the Forte there... come back and let me know.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Very well, though why aren't you—Uhh... My apologies, I shouldn't have asked. I will go right now.
attributes.name: Part-Timer

attributes.content: Benefactor, I asked around, and it seems we'll arrive at our rendezvous point if we follow this path up the mountain.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: But suppose we really don't find anyone there, what should we do?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Then we'll just have to go back to the Liang estate to find Mr. Lee. He said Magistrate Liang asked him to look into the goblet's owner. We should help him out.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But what if Miss Du spoke the truth, and it was indeed a man of renown who seeks the cup...? Would Magistrate Liang truly know nothing of it?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: But would that all of this was a mere premeditated conspiracy, why would Magistrate Liang need to go through the trouble and put on such a show?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: It's not like we haven't ever seen any big shots ourselves.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You mean the boy who claimed to be a Messenger...?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Haha... If only the Doctor was around. We could've just handed all this trouble off.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: *Sigh*... I miss the dorm's soft beds.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Why must we always mix ourselves up in trouble...?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Finish your tea... It's time to go.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Travel-Weary Woman

attributes.content: Should be around here...
attributes.name: Travel-Weary Woman

attributes.content: Hot water coming through. Out of the way—
attributes.name: Hurrying Assistant

attributes.content: Hm! Watch out!
attributes.name: Hurrying Assistant

attributes.content: (Rim Billitonian) —Strewth! Don't scratch the paint, cobba.
attributes.name: Travel-Weary Woman

attributes.content: A letter? From just now...?
attributes.name: Travel-Weary Woman

attributes.content: It's past the rendezvous time. They really didn't come.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: What should we do now? We don't know if Benefactor Lava has been to the office...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Perhaps we should wait a little longer?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Or we could meet up with Mr. Lee first—Hm?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Gkh—!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: An Ink Spirit...?!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hold on, hold on! Can those things leave the scrolls?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I have no idea myself...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Hey, little guy. Where did you come from? Where's your owner?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Gkhaa!
attributes.name: Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Hey, no biting! Let go! Let go!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You're the one who provoked it.
Bitey, that's enough.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Owie—!
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Dusk!
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: We ran into a bit of trouble. You'll have to bear with me talking to you this way.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Trouble...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. It's nothing you can help with.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: In Shangshu, we ran into some court envoys who're investigating what happened at Mount Hui-ch'i in Kou-wu City... They said they're from the Sui Regulator.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Tsk... I thought Nian would have everything sorted out by the time she came knocking on my door.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: It seems I should've kept my expectations low with the way she goes about things.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Did you fight them?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Heaven forbid we should try to tussle with the mandarins... Not that we would've won if we'd tried, haha...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: They mentioned you and Nian, but it didn't seem like they were looking into you two too seriously.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: They came to Shangshu on a different mission.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: I don't know about that... Do you have any clues?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: It's got something to do with a black goblet.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Black... goblet.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: We're helping a certain Mr. Lee to look into the cup's master too. The cup looked like it had a pattern on it... Much like the trinket that Nian gave Benefactor Lava.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: A cup... No wonder something seemed strange... I have a pretty strong hunch as to who that cup belongs to.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: She can help us with quite a bit if we actually manage to find her. At the very least, she can help me keep Nian's mouth shut.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Dusk! Get out here already! The old fart's rambling away, he's really pissing me off! It's your turn!
Uhh... Is that Nian?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You must've misheard.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Heavenly forge—
P-Perhaps we should keep you no longer?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: You said you're looking for the master of the cup, weren't you?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Find her before the mandarins do. Persuade her to help us.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: At the very least, drag this out until we get to Shangshu. Don't let the Sui Regulator take her away.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I'm counting on you.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Hm, we're back...?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Benefactor, is it just me, or does this baffling trickery of Dusk's really come in handy?
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: It's not worldly Arts anyway, so don't bother trying to learn it.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: But it is convenient, I'll give you that.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: You're looking for a pavilion?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I'm guessing that a pole-carrier like you, having come up and down the mountains so many times, the range here must be like your own backyard.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Let me tell you, then. The Three Mounts and Seventeen Peaks are full of pavilions, be it old rest stops or newly built scenic spots.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: It's tough to find a specific one.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: You can do it.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It'll take a lot of work, and I get paid by the trip, you know...
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Not like anyone across the world would work for free.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Indeed. Here's your reward, then.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're from Lungmen?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Yes, what should I call you, kind sir?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The name's Shang... Like Shang-Qie.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: What do you want me to do for you? Be your guide? Or do you want me to find somewhere that fits the description and report back?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Time is of the essence. It'll be for the better if we can split up.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're not from around here... and you're with a boatman?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: I've spent a very long time in the rivers, and I am familiar enough with the area.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: The rivers are nothing like the mountain roads.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: They're both in Shangshu.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You can skip the Bieli, Ziyun, and Qingluan Peaks. They're just small peaks that people back in the old days decided to count toward the Seventeen Peaks.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Very well. We're actually focusing our search today on the Qujiang Peak here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'd appreciate if you could find me some clues before sundown... and please do look out for any towns with famous wine shops while you're in the mountains.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wine?
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Aren't all those who frequent pavilions connoisseurs of drink? They're always passed out drunk in them.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I'll ask around, then.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Much thanks.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We'll meet in the teahouse there in the evening, then.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Pole-Carrier

attributes.content: Well, if you aren't a casual guy. You pulled a random person off the street and asked them to help you. Aren't you afraid of getting duped?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I'm a detective. Gotta take a risk every now and then.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Can we trust him?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Just barely. He got attention from all the shopkeeps along the road. That means he's got decent relationships.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A pole-carrier who would swindle this little money wouldn't have such a good reputation in the neighborhood.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Besides, it's better than searching blindly.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You have a point... Where do we head next, then? Any clues?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: A mysterious person that our magistrate insists is in Shangshu, their whereabouts unknown nonetheless, wouldn't hang out in a normal town like this.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: So much of the problem lies in the cup.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Besides... If someone's bent on getting their hands on this no-name goblet, it only means that this little trinket is the key.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Master Shen, suppose the two of us run into the thieves from the other day. Do you think we can fend them off together?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: *Sigh*, I've spent a few decades on the rivers, and the only thing I've ever worried about is how my grandchildren are doing in school. I've never fought anyone, and it would be quite the problem if I ever ran into a bandit.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: All I can do is be your tour guide, kid. If you're worried, you'd better go to Mr. Liang soon and have him find you a bodyguard or two.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: You haven't ever needed to lift a finger in your line of business?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I've been boating on the rivers for a few dozen years. I've never gotten myself into any of those hairy situations.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I can guarantee your safety if we run into some wild beasts on our journey through the mountains...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: But with all the construction around the mountains the past couple years, you won't come across any beasts.
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: So there aren't any wild beasts... but are there any creatures with metal plates on their backs?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Now what's that about?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I don't know myself.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Where did you see that?
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I saw it...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: ...right here.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: This... this is...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Ao!
attributes.name: Strange Object

attributes.content: Hm, it's gone...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You scared it away...
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Street Youth

attributes.content: Need something...?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do you have the cup?
attributes.name: Suspicious Townsfolk

attributes.content: We work for Innkeeper Zheng. He has a small eatery in this town as well. He wants to treat you to lunch.
attributes.name: Suspicious Townsfolk

attributes.content: Run!
attributes.name: Boatman

attributes.content: I really don't understand what Miss Du and the innkeeper are thinking. This is such a pain in the ass...
attributes.name: Street Youth A

attributes.content: First, they want us to steal the goods, then they want us to ensure no one makes off with it, and they even want us to get in the employer's way... Hm?
attributes.name: Street Youth B

attributes.content: Hey, get up. Take a look over there...
attributes.name: Street Youth B

attributes.content: Stop right there...!
attributes.name: Street Youth B

attributes.content: Hello, sir. How may I help you?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Uh... Umm... I'm traveling right now, but I lost my wallet. I don't know nobody here. Think you can help me out?
attributes.name: Street Youth B

attributes.content: Did all of you lose your wallets together?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: N-No, we... uh... we couldn't all be bothered to bring our backpacks with us, you know? So we put our cameras and wallets and whatnot all in one bag. It's the bag that we lost.
attributes.name: Street Youth B

attributes.content: We ain't gonna ask much from you. Just head back down the mountain and call the cops at the hotel there. I promise it'll be worth your while. Please, help us.
attributes.name: Street Youth A

attributes.content: Look at the time already... Sundown here comes early, huh?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Nothing, mate, how do we get to the Liang estate again?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: This way, Benefactor...
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Shangshu's streets and alleys are vivid and colorful. There's a certain charm to gazing out at the mountains in the distance and the markets below from atop the skyscrapers here.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: It's an entirely different scenery than what you'd find in Kou-wu.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Right. It's got a nice vibe, and the view is great. Not to mention, when the wind blows, you can sometimes smell the rust.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Am I right?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: It has been a while since my blade was last unsheathed. How could it possibly rust?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You need us for something?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Of course... Rhodes Island has gotten too involved.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So you've been digging up dirt on us?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Here's a Yanese idiom you might like, Miss Kroos. 'Justice casts a wide net.'
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: A medical company that strives to rescue all Infected and sees them as equals, regardless of their race, status, and wealth—
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: —Even the purest of mountain springs must be no match for Rhodes Island in purity.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Thanks for the compliment.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Oh, please don't get the wrong idea... I didn't mean that as a threat.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: After all, if Rhodes Island was a dishonest organization, you two would be in jail right now.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In other words, I would like you two to see our current situation as a form of trust.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Should I say thanks?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: However, Infected should not be wandering about in such a bustling part of town out in the open. Safety remains a concern, after all.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Would you follow me? Let's take this somewhere else.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (What should we do, Benefactor? This kid's sketchy through and through.)
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: (Not necessarily, and it's not like we have a choice...)
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Sure, let's go somewhere else.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Very well. I see you two are of formidable talent as well. I'll wait for you at the top of the tower to the north in a quarter hour.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is that what you guys call qinggong in Yanese martial arts?
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: More or less. Of course, considering his martial prowess, he's no normal man.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Alright, fine... He's extraordinary, actually.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: I don't see you get this serious often.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Haha, you jest, my benefactor. I'm always solemn and serious about every last detail.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: To possess such fine skills at his age... He must have studied under a distinguished master to hone his extraordinary talent. Even that might be an understatement. His abilities are likely beyond our imagination.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: Like I was saying, if he had that bull of a mandarin for a bodyguard, he is not to be taken lightly.
attributes.name: Mr. Nothing

attributes.content: They know about Nian and Dusk. Obviously, they know about Mr. Lee too.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Dusk said... We have to find the goblet's master first.
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: Getting involved with a Yanese mandarin, though... Amiya's going to chew me out when we get back...
attributes.name: Kroos

attributes.content: *Sigh*, if only the Doctor... Guess we can't always count on the Doctor, huh...
attributes.name: Kroos
